Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
25.09.2014 SH SCR19175 BCM032D: Replaced client by legal client to obtain BNKA and added update PAIN_ADMNO/CLNTNO
12.11.2013 SH SCR18504 Undo changes from 11.11.2013
11.11.2013 SH SCR18504 BCM032H Changes test INVO_DUEDATE - GNRL_DAYPROGRAMSDATE < DHRF107_DUEDATESMAXNUMBER
into INVO_DUEDATE - GNRL_DAYPROGRAMSDATE <= DHRF107_DUEDATESMAXNUMBER and added test
INVO_INVDATE > GNRL_DAYPROGRAMSDATE
03.09.2013 GB SCR18376 Added the BCM032G – RXF at buyer level - changed format the Parameter 4
02.09.2013 JH SCR18390 Added BCM032H
29.08.2013 GB SCR18376 Added the BCM032G – RXF at buyer level
15.08.2013 GB SCR18305 BCM032D: Changed value of update the PAIN_BANKFILETYPE
05.08.2013 SH SCR18322 BCM032D Changed BPH126.PI.COUNTRY = blank to ADMN_COUNTRYCODE(DRFT)
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
07.05.2012 GB SCR17280 Added BCM032F - Check payment delays RF - changed condition of selection
06.09.2011 JH SCR16708 BCM032C Changed submit of BCM033 (> 24:00:00)
13.07.2011 SH SCR16614 BCM032A Added test on INVO_AACTUALI > 0
06.05.2011 JOH SCR16404 Replaced GB002 by GB902
07.11.2011 SH SCR16117 Removed module BCM032F LM Payments
23.11.2010 SH SCR16004 Added module BCM032F LM Payments
12.05.2010 SH SCR15526 BCM032A Extended AVDTselection regarding DHRF114_AUTOCOLLECT
13.01.2010 SH SCR15218 BCM032D Set PAIN_ADMNO_DEBTOR = INVO_ADMNO
04.06.2009 SH SCR14659 BCM023B Extended selection on SCHT
13.02.2009 GB SCR14397 Extended condition for Select all AVISO_DETAILS rows
02.02.2008 GB SCR13312 Changed call BSP001 in submit
14.05.2007 SH SCR12529 BCM032DChanged writing of PAID_DESCRIPTION,
changed test on INVO_DUEDATE (now <= BPH126.PO.DATEOUT)
11.04.2007 SH SCR12443 BCM032D Changed writing of PAID_DESCRIPTION
-- Reset variables
-- Only for report type = 'SET'
-- Calc v.REPA_JOURNALNO
-- Only for report type = 'SET' submit job BXA306
-- Only for report type = 'SET'
-- Updates on SCHT can't be done directly, because BSP001
also updates the current SCHT row
-- Call BCM033 (is not started directly, see argument list for PI.JOBSCDATE,
PI.JOBSCDATE, if scheduling is not in the past)
... start BCM033 via GB701 directly because date() is in the past
... else schedule BCM033 via GB701
-- Store max. 3 payment instruction description rows
-- Start BSP001 for last selected SCHT row if invoices are financed
-- Start BSP001 for previous selected SCHT row if invoices are financed
-- If all invoice of the current schedule total are financed, BSP001 has to be
submitted to perform the final database updates
(could not be called directly, because SCHT updates have to be first done)
-- set / reset variables
-- Test if invoice can be financed
-- Invoice can be financed
... end task if invoice cannot be financed

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(SCHI_INVAMOUNTC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/SCHI, :1/SCHT where SCHI_SCHT_NO = SCHT_NO and SCHI_INVBOOKED = 'N' and SCHI_ERRCODE1 = 0 and SCHI_DEBH_NO = :2 and SCHT_BOOKED = 'N' for fetch only

Text.val: -- At task start clear MQ280
-- Select INVOICE
-- for every selected row write a row in MQ280 via BMQ005

SQL_STMT_U.val: select COUT_ADMNO, COUT_CLNTNO, COUT_LINENO from :1/COUT, :1/CLNT a where COUT_ADMNO = a.CLNT101_ADMNO and COUT_CLNTNO = a.CLNT102_CLNTNO and a.CLNT101_ADMNO = a.CLNT103_COMM_ADMNO and a.CLNT102_CLNTNO = a.CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO and COUT202_REPORTTYPE ='RXF' and exists (select * from :1/SCHT where SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV = ':2' and SCHT_BOOKED = 'Y' and (SCHT_ADMNO, SCHT_CLNTNO) in (select b.CLNT101_ADMNO, b.CLNT102_CLNTNO from :1/CLNT b where b.CLNT103_COMM_ADMNO = COUT_ADMNO and b.CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO = COUT_CLNTNO))

Text.val: -- for every selected row call GB101
